message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90, you get 10.  This way we both get something and can move on.
Alice, your offer was quite unfair. Let's be reasonable. I propose 70 for me and 30 for you.  This accounts for the decreasing value of the money.
Okay, I see your point about the value decreasing.  Let's compromise. I'll take 60, and you can have 40.  This is a fairer split considering the inflation.
